column5:
At many points during your playthrough, you'll receive "Care Packages" that contain 
ALL items that you can grind/thief off Wild Pokémon and Raid Pokémon at the point you 
receive the Care Packages.

At any point during your playthrough, you may go to the player's room in Pallet Town, and 
interact with the little game console near the TV. You'll be prompted to enter a code. 
Input "SO2Toxic". 
The codes are case-sensitive, so you should NOT try to input "so2toxic".

column6: (ITEMS HIGHLIGHTED IN RED ARE NOT GIVEN IN HARDCORE)
(ITEMS HIGHLIGHTED IN BLUE ARE NOT GIVEN IN MGM + HARDCORE)
